definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The straight line signature of cosmic ray muons disappears underground.
sentences.chinese: 直線簽字宇宙射線μ介子消失地下。

sentences.english: Whatever measures are taken to ward off cosmic rays should also protect against these solar tempests .
sentences.chinese: 任何防堵宇宙射線的措施，都該考慮到這些太陽風暴。

sentences.english: Cosmic rays and X- rays produce energetic electrons by ionization.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙射線和X射線因其電離作用產生高能電子。

sentences.english: For our technology, cosmic rays are a menace too.
sentences.chinese: 對於我們的設備來說，宇宙射線也是一個威脅。

sentences.english: Cosmic rays and X-rays produce energetic electrons by ionization.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙射線和X射線因其電離作用產生高能電子。
